name: electron-angular-java
description: Build cross platform desktop apps with web technologies using java from javascript
author: Daniel Garcia Mandillo

scripts.build: npm install --no-optional && npm run typings-install && npm run build-demo
scripts.build-demo: npm install --no-optional angular2@2.0.0-beta.12 es6-promise@3.1.2 es6-shim@0.35.0 reflect-metadata@0.1.2 rxjs@5.0.0-beta.2 zone.js@0.6.6
scripts.demo: npm run compile && npm run compile_app && electron .
